commit.message:
[SYNCOPE-101] Spurious .zip and .tar.gz were added when root POM wasn't extending Apache parent POM; now reverted to default behaviour + updated site docs (for next release onwards)

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/syncope/trunk@1354505 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
